title: Patch 9.1 and 9.2 are what is going to kill season 9
body:
[Crit changes](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wqEsu1TNBqw)
The numbers aren't completely definite but these are proposed changes that are more than likely to stay based on the whining of adc mains on the league subreddit
[Patch 9.1 in a nutshell](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_08PRro00Io&t=4s)
All you need to take from this video is that vayne post 6 now has permastealth with a guaranteed crit and her W true damage %hp proc
Kalista got buffs while being the most toxic design of an adc for higher level play and purposefully left super nerfed for a reason
No compensation for tanks with these changes
Damage still going up, defenses going down as usual with dmg going up

Anything you wanted to lower damage ain't happening and this patch sets in stone an exponential increase in damage, and a lack of counterplay.

Also nasus is going to further polarize top lane matchups ~~but riot literally has no top laners on their balance team who cares~~

Glad I have reduced my games per month  to maybe 4-5 vs daily playing because riot doesn't deserve their playerbase for this or last season's lack of balance
